show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
gm gm ‚ù§Ô∏è

We're finally ready to unveil Epoch 8.

ü•Åü•Åü•Å This epoch is an Ethereum-core alignment epoch. It's a special one because it's a major step in our broader roadmap to contribute to Ethereum's growth.

Like Epoch 7, there's no snapshot. Our internal reviewers will select projects based on impact and relevance.

Allocation window remains the same. ETH rewards are time-weighted and allocating to projects get you matched

üóìApplication Deadline: 3 June, 2025 @ 11:59 pm PST

üõ† Who should apply?
Builders advancing Ethereum in 4 core areas:

1) Direct protocol improvements (consensus, execution, data availability, core networking)

2) Shared infrastructure (clients, testnets & tooling, p2p networking stacks, security & formal-verification frameworks, transparency)

3) Open dashboards, datasets, or studies (roll-ups, bridges, MEVs -  resulting insights must strengthen Ethereum)

4) Protocol-level research + specification work (advancing Ethereum's roadmap)

App link + eligibility criteria üëá

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
If you get caught using Amps on any submissions, you will likely get disqualified. 

We are trying to help the community find what matters, stop being greedy.

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
Farcaster Pro update

10,000 sold out in less than 6 hours!

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
Can I still subscribe to Farcaster Pro?

Yes. Farcaster Pro is bound to your account (FID) and will give you additional features for your account over time.

Again, the first 10,000 subscriptions included a limited edition NFT. 
But all future features we're working on will go to all Pro subscribers. It won't matter if you have the NFT or not.

It's optional, does not increase your reach, visibility or rewards.

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text: We sold 10,000 x $120 pro subscriptions for the protocol today with stablecoins on Base. No hiccups. For less than $10 in gas fees.

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
Farcaster Pro near-term roadmap

A reminder -- this applies to all Pro subscribers -- regardless of whether you have an NFT. The Pro subscription is bound to your Farcaster account (FID).

a. Ship onchain contracts / protocol changes for pro

b. A new previously unannounced benefit launching in the next day or two

c. 10K character casts

d. Up to 4 images in casts

e. Ability to gift Pro subscriptions to other users ‚Äî we will likely allow monthly, i.e. $10 increments

Again, the NFT is a collectible. There are no other benefits to NFT holders. All benefits we will work on will be for Pro subscribers.

On the MisinforMedia podcast this morning, Farcaster founder Dan Romero said he wants to "earn the people's hearts, best emails, and $120" ‚Äî agreeing that "animated PFPs are the only way to truly bring culture back to the purple app".

With the new subscription model, users will finally get access back to the loved feature that's been causing problems for nearly 50% of Farcaster users (that is, 17 Android phones).

Users absolutely losing it after the news!

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
Don‚Äôt use your FC wallet keys in other wallets. 

If you get compromised, there is no way to rotate the wallet with our key storage model today. 

It‚Äôs ok to export your keys and put in a password manager, or to send funds out to another wallet.

cast.text: Please be extra careful when exporting your Farcaster wallet private key. Have had 2 users message me today that it was compromised after storing outside of Farcaster and funds were drained :(

show_title: GM Farcaster ep251 Wednesday May 28, 2025 presented by Octant
text:
We've offered a managed Kafka streaming service for Farcaster events for a bit now - benefit being able to read fully hydrated objects real time instead of raw hub events

So far, the only option was to subscribe to the full stream or not subscribe at all - same hubs

Now, it's possible to subscribe by event type e.g. get cast.created or reaction.created events only (same as webhooks)

So you end up with a stream that has rich objects with all metadata and only has the objects you need so you don't need to filter (also lowers cost when consuming)

Reach out if interested ü™ê

see more:
- https://farcaster.xyz/rish/0x7c2997ec
- https://docs.neynar.com/docs/from-kafka-stream

cast.text: If you want to subscribe to our Kafka data pipeline but don't want to pay for all of the messages you're not interested in, such as reactions, now you don't have to. In addition to our aggregated offering, we have broken out farcaster events into separate Kafka topics for users, casts, reactions, follows, and signers to save you $ and bandwidth. Reach out to @rish if you're interested!

(niche feature, bit more iykyk)

For those streaming raw events straight from a hub gRPC, you know the events need to be massaged and joined with other data before they can be used in your app.

To solve for that, we now have a real time Kafka stream where developers can consume fully hydrated events and use them directly in their applications.

Screenshot below shows raw hub event on the left and Kafka stream event on the right, you'll notice even the embed metadata is hydrated in Kafka.

The Kafka pipeline stores the events for longer so if your app missed something, you can pick back up from where you left off. Overall, should make development a lot easier compared to wrangling raw hub streams.

Reach out if interested. There is a node example you can plug and play to get started: https://github.com/neynarxyz/farcaster-examples/tree/main/neynar-webhook-kafka-consumer

h/t @flashprofits.eth @shreyas-chorge for the work

ü™ê

https://docs.neynar.com/docs/from-kafka-stream
